snippet: The Near Eastside, a rundown Indianapolis neighborhood, is benefiting from the refurbishing the downtown area is undergoing in anticipation of the first Super Bowl to be played in the city.
abstract: Rundown Near Eastside neighborhood of Indianapolis is benefiting from rebuilding efforts in the downtown area in anticipation of the Super Bowl, the first to be played in the city.
lead_paragraph: The Near Eastside, a rundown Indianapolis neighborhood, is benefiting from the refurbishing the downtown area is undergoing in anticipation of the first Super Bowl to be played in the city.

headline.seo: Near Eastside Section of Indianapolis Benefits From Super Bowl Bid
headline.main: Unexpected Benefits From a Super Bowl Bid
headline.print_headline: Unexpected Benefits From a Super Bowl Bid
